item.title: In Farewell Address, As In His Presidency, Everyone Just Wants Joe Biden To Stop Talking
item.description: Turns out, it would have been better if Biden had left in an Irish goodbye.

item.title: Grassley Calls On Bondi To Ensure Political Weaponization Of The DOJ ‘Never Happens Again’
item.description: Sen. Chuck Grassley called out the DOJ's targeting of conservatives, asking Pam Bondi to ensure it 'never happens again' if confirmed as AG.
